You know why they call it fool's gold? Because only fools would laugh at a serious scientist who's come here to engage in elemental...transmutation!

And I'm so close to a breakthrough! Soon, the power to create gold will be mine! Mine!"Hooray?"

The trick—and I can't believe my colleagues haven't tried this—is to use magic, not just a collection of chemical compounds.

There's a whole sympathetic magic thing going on here. It's rather complicated.

For various arbitrary and esoteric reasons, I need eyes of avarice. Slay the {@LinkCreature:472#29#Sihran avaritians} in the Golden Labyrinth, then come back and I'll explain more.

You see, it's sympathetic magic. For transmutation into gold, I need an eye that's been blinded by greed.

Bring it closer. The light in here isn't so good.
